biotools.summary: Web server for simultaneous estimation of protein multiple sequence alignments and phylogenetic trees. Input is a FASTA file of sequences, and output is a phylogenetic tree and multiple sequence alignment.

bioschemas.name: SATCHMO-JS
bioschemas.summary: Web server for simultaneous estimation of protein multiple sequence alignments and phylogenetic trees. Input is a FASTA file of sequences, and output is a phylogenetic tree and multiple sequence alignment.
